languages.text: {n}Кибелла медлит. Ее рука спускается вниз, несмело касаясь вашей груди.{/n} "Между нами... много того, что неясно мне. Не только переборки палуб, но и духовное расстояние. Ты вступил{mf||а} в мой лабиринт. Я побывала в твоем мире. Но нам еще многое надо познать друг в друге. Я приглашаю тебя на свои тропы, чтобы ты меня познал{mf||а}. А я — тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла медлит. Ее рука спускается вниз, несмело касаясь вашей груди.{/n} "То, что между нами... мне все еще неясно значение оного. Между нами — не только переборки палуб, но и духовное расстояние. Ты вступил в мой лабиринт. Я побывала в твоем мире. Нам нужно... идти глубже. Познавать. Понимать. Кан'Шин — ритуал на двоих. Он поможет нам".

languages.text: {n}She pauses before answering. She moves her hand down, cautiously touching your chest.{/n} "There is... much between us that I have yet to understand. Decks and bulkheads separate us, but greater still is the spiritual distance. You have entered my labyrinth, and I have been to your world. But there is still so much more that we must learn about each other. I am inviting you to walk my paths so that you may see into me. And I into you."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла медлит. Ее рука спускается вниз, несмело касаясь вашей груди.{/n} "Между нами... много того, что неясно мне. Не только переборки палуб, но и духовное расстояние. Ты вступил{mf||а} в мой лабиринт. Я побывала в твоем мире. Но нам еще многое надо познать друг в друге. Я приглашаю тебя на свои тропы, чтобы ты меня познал{mf||а}. А я — тебя".

Decks and bulkheads lie between us, but greater still is the spiritual distance. You have entered my labyrinth. I have been to your world. But there is still more we must learn about one other. I am inviting you to walk my paths so that you may see into me. And I into you."

languages.text: {n}Sie hält inne, ehe sie antwortet. Sie bewegt ihre Hand nach unten und berührt vorsichtig deine Brust.{/n} "Es ist ... so viel zwischen uns, was ich noch nicht verstehe. Decks und Schotten liegen zwischen uns, doch weit größer ist die spirituelle Distanz. Ihr habt mein Labyrinth betreten, und ich war in Eurer Welt. Doch es gibt immer noch so viel, was wir voneinander erfahren müssen. Ich lade Euch ein, meine Pfade zu beschreiten, auf dass Ihr in mich hineinsehen könnt. Und ich in Euch."

languages.text: {n}Hace una pausa antes de contestar. Baja su mano para tocar con cautela tu pecho.{/n} «Hay... mucho entre nosotros que aún no he conseguido comprender. Nos separan cubiertas y mamparas, pero nuestra distancia espiritual es aún mayor. Usted ha entrado en mi laberinto y yo he estado en su mundo, pero aún nos queda mucho más que aprender sobre {mf|el otro|la otra}. L{mf|e|a} estoy invitando a recorrer mis caminos para que pueda atisbar mi interior. Y yo el suyo».
languages.original_text: {n}She pauses before answering. She moves her hand down, cautiously touching your chest.{/n} "There is... much between us that I have yet to understand. Decks and bulkheads separate us, but greater still is the spiritual distance. You have entered my labyrinth, and I have been to your world. But there is still so much more that we must learn about each other. I am inviting you to walk my paths so that you may see into me. And I into you."

languages.text: {n}彼女は間を置いてから答える。彼女は手を下へと動かして、慎重にあなたの胸に触れた。{/n}「私たちの間には…理解しあえないことがまだたくさんある。デッキや隔壁が私たちを隔ているけれど、それ以上に精神的な距離があるの。あなたは私の迷宮に入り、私はあなたの世界に行った。けれどお互いについて学ばなければならないことは、まだたくさんあるわ。あなたが私をもっと理解できるよう、そして私があなたを理解するためにも、私の道を歩いてみないかと誘っているの」
languages.original_text: {n}She pauses before answering. She moves her hand down, cautiously touching your chest.{/n} "There is... much between us that I have yet to understand. Decks and bulkheads separate us, but greater still is the spiritual distance. You have entered my labyrinth, and I have been to your world. But there is still so much more that we must learn about each other. I am inviting you to walk my paths so that you may see into me. And I into you."

languages.text: {n}她顿了顿，随后才开了口。她的手向你身上游移过来，小心翼翼地抚摸着你的胸口。{/n}“因为……你我之间，还有许多我尚不了解的地方。我们之间横亘着无数甲板与船舱，但比这更加遥远的，是精神的距离。你进入了我的迷宫，我也去过了你的世界，但我们还有许多需要相互了解的东西。我邀请你踏上我曾走过的路，这样你便能理解我，我也能理解你。”
languages.original_text: {n}She pauses before answering. She moves her hand down, cautiously touching your chest.{/n} "There is... much between us that I have yet to understand. Decks and bulkheads separate us, but greater still is the spiritual distance. You have entered my labyrinth, and I have been to your world. But there is still so much more that we must learn about each other. I am inviting you to walk my paths so that you may see into me. And I into you."

languages.text: {n}Elle marque une pause avant de répondre en effleurant prudemment votre poitrine.{/n} « Tant de ce qui se passe entre nous m'échappe encore. Bien des ponts et des cloisons se dressent entre nous, mais la distance spirituelle qui nous sépare est bien plus grande. Vous avez pénétré dans mon labyrinthe, et j'ai visité votre monde. Mais nous avons encore beaucoup à apprendre l'{mf|un|une} sur l'autre. Je vous propose d'emprunter la même voie que moi pour que vous puissiez mieux me comprendre. Et j'en ferai autant. »
languages.original_text: {n}She pauses before answering. She moves her hand down, cautiously touching your chest.{/n} "There is... much between us that I have yet to understand. Decks and bulkheads separate us, but greater still is the spiritual distance. You have entered my labyrinth, and I have been to your world. But there is still so much more that we must learn about each other. I am inviting you to walk my paths so that you may see into me. And I into you."

languages.text: {n}Cevap vermeden önce duraksıyor. Elini aşağı kaydırarak dikkatle göğsüne dokunuyor.{/n} "Aramızda... Henüz anlayamadığım daha pek çok şey var. Aramızdaki güverteler ve bölme panelleri bizi ayırsa da ruhani mesafe daha da büyük. Sen labirentime girdin, ben de dünyana girdim. Ancak birbirimize dair öğrenmemiz gereken çok daha fazlası var. Beni keşfetmen ve... Benim de seni keşfetmem için yollarımda yürümeni rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}She pauses before answering. She moves her hand down, cautiously touching your chest.{/n} "There is... much between us that I have yet to understand.
